text:
Figured it out :slightly_smiling_face:
Is was the responsive grid stylesheet that wasn't added:
<https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/cms/guides/creating-a-drag-and-drop-area#create-a-new-html-template>

But the image in the image-modue
Is it possible to set the size to automatically adjust from the template?
There is no setting for this in the documentation
<https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/cms/hubl/tags#image>
It defaults to "Exact width and height"

Nvm, found out
It's possible to set
```'size_type': 'auto_custom_max',```
To bad it's not in the documentation
Sorry I fell asleep it was pretty late for me

No problem!
Nope. I used the blank theme (was for the certification), but I'm guessing this is included in the boilerplate

Heyo, im using the CRM object field to pull data from an custom object in my page, however, with the dropdown properties it displays the internal value rather than the label, any ideas on how to fix this? i tried putting `.label` and `.name` behind the `item.crm_object.properties.property_name`  but that gave me no results
this makes a lot of sense — there are so many nicer things in the boilerplate

Hey all, we've got view that listing of custom custom objects associated to a contact. We've got one object that does not show up after using |sort
It is available before sorting but is completely missing after

Has anyone seen this before?

you can debug this by doing something like `{{ item.crm_object.properties|pprint }}` and that will show you what is possible with that, for teh property_name as well you could try that. Sorry I don’t have the answer, just a way for you to see whats available
